title: The Favorites - NFL Week 9 Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 9 Best Bets
description:
If there was ever a week to drag your big balls into a foxhole, it's this one.

Confused? You won't be after listening to another rousing episode of NFL betting analysis from Action Network experts Chad Millman and professional bettor Simon Hunter. Together they discuss the calls from fellow gamblers Simon received this week, the lines that have moved, COVID impact, moneyline underdogs to take and so much more. Does a Sam Darnold injury matter? Is Justin Herbert okay? Should we all blow our Viking horns? Listen now to find out!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
